newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Belgian shares end near lows, Bel-20 off 1.0 pct.
newsitem.headline: Belgian shares end near lows, Bel-20 off 1.0 pct.

text.p: 1540 GMT - Belgian shares end near lows as dollar weakness and early Dow .DJI drop erode already shaky sentiment
* Bel-20 index .BFX ends 21.93 points, one percent lower at 2,170.95 points. Seventeen issues lower, one up, two unchanged. Volume moderate 3.8 billion Belgian francs.
* Insurer Royale Belge star outperformer, adding 2.34 percent to 9,200 francs on speculation about link with AXA Belgium or reinforcement of AXA-UAP control
* Electrabel loses 60 francs to 7,970 francs before news 1996 profit rose six percent to 30.4 billion francs. Net dividend as expected up four percent at 352 francs
